name: PolyFarm EGG
description: "A New Ever-Evolving NFT Farming Game, where every action matters. Each Season will bring new Game assets, Challenges and strategies. Chapter 1: Summer Season ""The Hens and the Foxes"" the battle for the $EGG between Hens and Foxes. Chapter 2: Autumn Season. Start growing $CORN. Land, Farms, Farmers, Buildings, all of them new NFTs and Tokens. Get ready and save Corn for the winter."
